panel.title: 【session data】【ingoing】source="IIIII" host="HHHHH" sourcetype="csv" sourcetype="csv" earliest=-3d@d latest=-1d@d | timechart count as count span=10m | streamstats window=12 avg(count) as avg stdev(count) as stdev | eval lower_bound = avg - stdev * 2 | eval upper_bound = avg + stdev * 2 | eval isOutlier = if(count>upper_bound OR count<lower_bound, 1, 0) | fields - avg stdev

source="IIIII" host="HHHHH" sourcetype="csv" earliest=-3d@d latest=-1d@d | timechart count as count span=10m | streamstats window=12 avg(count) as avg stdev(count) as stdev | eval lower_bound = avg - stdev * 2 | eval upper_bound = avg + stdev * 2 | eval isOutlier = if(count>upper_bound OR count<lower_bound, 1, 0) | fields - avg stdev | sort count desc | where isOutlier==1 | head 5
